name: IP Advisers
overview:
IP Advisers, founded in 2003, is a specialized, independent consulting boutique providing intellectual property consulting as well as financial advisory services to law firms, research institutions, legal counsel and large companies.

Our intellectual property consulting portfolio currently includes IP protection, litigation opinions, and IP transfer advisory. Our financial advisory portfolio currently includes macroeconomic analysis, industry analysis, capital structure analysis, and M&A advisory services.

IP Advisers is headquartered in Richardson, Texas, in the heart of Dallas Fort Worth Metroplex’s Telecom Corridor. IP Advisers is a private Texas corporation with about a dozen active consultants, technology advisers, scientists and patent prosecution professionals. Over 20% of our staff have doctorates in their respective fields.

We take tremendous pride in our staff. In fact, we treasure their personalities and common sense as much as their industry and scientific expertise.

Our skills and core values represent the cornerstone of our ability to deliver outstanding results and services by accurately addressing some of the most pressing concerns facing our clients today.
